act:
889674 THE COTTON CLOTH (REPEAL) ACT, 2000
ACT NO. 25 OF 2000 [ 11th August, 2000.]
An Act to repeal the Cotton Cloth Act, 1918.
BE it enacted by Parliament in the Fifty- first Year of the Republic of India as follows:-
928252 1Short title.- This Act may be called the Cotton Cloth (Repeal) Act, 2000.
472598 2Repeal of Act 23 of 1918.- The Cotton Cloth Act, 1918 is hereby repealed. SUBHASH C. JAIN, Secretary to the Govt. of India.
